EmailTemplate.name: Norwich office - 2015 client event
EmailTemplate.subject: INVITATION - AECOM Norwich Client Reception 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us for drinks and canapés at AECOM’s Annual Client Reception in the Weston Room, The Hostry
Norwich Cathedral, Norwich NR1 4DH
on Thursday 12 November 2015, from 5.30pm
Please RSVP to janet.gale@aecom.com by 29 October 2015
